name: Spray deodorant
title: Axe Apollo · Spray deodorant · 48h, 0% aluminum salts
description: Axe Spray deodorant 48h, 0% aluminum salts Classic masculine

cosmeticInformation.ingredients: Ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Parfum, Zinc Neodecanoate, Isopropyl Myristate, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Limonene, Linalool.

usageInformation.additionalInformation: Effective protection against body odor. The same laws of attraction apply here on earth as in the entire solar system. It is always about a balanced interplay between closeness and distance. A dance in which people circle around each other, approach each other again and again before moving apart again. So you can twist and turn it however you like. It always remains exciting. AXE APOLLO has been designed for a world of attraction with its classic masculine, noble fragrance. It combines efficient AXE protection against body odor with one of the most fascinating fragrances, developed by the world's best fragrance experts. Completely without aluminum, AXE APOLLO protects its wearer so effectively that they can always count on their attractive appearance. The fragrance is lightly composed while impressing with its sturdy character. The combination of fruity notes of mandarin and quince circles exhilaratingly around the masculine gravitational base of sandalwood, sage and liquid amber. In combination, the result is a fragrance that has an uplifting effect on all the senses and at the same time protects against unpleasant odors safely and is absolutely free of aluminum. Simply spray the AXE Body Spray on the free upper body, that's it! AXE Apollo is the effective body spray with the exciting fragrance that tells of a dynamic personality who handles their attraction perfectly.

remarks.value: WARNHINWEISE: Aus nicht weniger als 15 cm Entfernung sprühen. Nicht auf gereizter oder verletzter Haut anwenden. Bei Auftreten von Hautirritationen nicht weiter verwenden. Direktes Einatmen vermeiden. Nur kurz sprühen und in gut gelüfteten Räumen verwenden, längeres Sprühen vermeiden. Kontakt mit Augen und Intimbereich vermeiden. Benutzung ausschließlich gemäß Verwendungszweck. Nur entleert entsorgen.
